name: He Sees You When You're Sleeping...
name_original: He Sees You When You're Sleeping...
description:
"He Sees You When You're Sleeping..."

A Horror-based game made for the Butterscotch Shenanijam 2019. The theme we chose was "Cursemas Eve"

Explore the area avoiding Santa, finding keys and collectibles, and escaping!

Don't get caught, as Santa is looking for you since you are on his naughty list.

Santa can see you if you're close enough or hear you if you aren't careful.

Controls:
WASD to move

Left CTRL to crouch

Left SHIFT to Sprint

Achievements:

-Tripod

-Healthy Living
